…and since then, she has coached hundreds of talented student- athletes.

During her time coaching, she has put together an inspiring track  record. She is an 8-time NCAA Division III West Region Coach of the  Year, a 10-time Northwest Conference Coach of the Year, and has an NCAA  National Championship under her belt.

…recognize Reese Gallagher  as the champion of the week for Ohio's 13th Congressional District.

Reese is a senior at Archbishop Hoban High School, and she was named  the Girls' Division III Player of the Year by the Ohio Scholastic  Soccer Coaches Association.

Reese has been described as an aggressive and ferocious player and is  heralded as the most prolific…

Mr. BELL. Mr. Speaker, I rise to recognize the Washington University  women's soccer team, who just secured their second-straight Division  III national championship. These student-athletes reflect the best of  St. Louis.

What they achieved this season didn't happen by accident. It came  from years of work, a…

…Georgia, and its vision is to be an innovative institution,  holistically educating students to connect with and contribute to an  ever-changing world.

…recognize a momentous  achievement by the men's volleyball team at Southern Virginia  University in Buena Vista, Virginia, which has brought home the  school's first-ever NCAA Division III National Championship victory.

On Monday night in Salem, Virginia, the Knights defeated powerhouse  Springfield College in a thrilling straight-set sweep of 25-20, 25-23,…

…part in this special season. They made their school and  community extremely proud.

I say to the Falcons, enjoy this victory. You earned it.
